an7.14:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, puggala ahuneyya pahuneyya dakkhineyya anjalikaraniya anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an7.14:1.3: Ubhatobhagavimutto, pannavimutto, kayasakkhi, ditthippatto, saddhavimutto, dhammanusari, saddhanusari.
an7.14:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta puggala ahuneyya pahuneyya dakkhineyya anjalikaraniya anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
